table.title: Display services newly discovered on hosts that were known before the selected period.

search.query: | snhostsearch filter="net_info.agg!=internet" | addinfo | spath first_seen | eval host_first_seen=strptime(first_seen, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6N%z") | eval diff_host_start=(tonumber(host_first_seen) - info_min_time) | search diff_host_start < 0 | rename first_seen as "Host First Seen" | spath services_count | search services_count > 1 | spath path=services{} output=service_info | mvexpand service_info | spath ip | spath input=service_info path=values{} output=service_details | mvexpand service_details | spath input=service_details | eval start_seen=strptime(first_seen, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6N%z") | eval diff_start=(tonumber(start_seen) - info_min_time) | search diff_start > 0 | eval diff_end=(info_max_time - tonumber(start_seen)) | search diff_end > 0| spath input=service_info port | spath net_info{0}.agg output=Net| eval Network=if(isnull(Net), "Unknown", Net) | rename first_seen as "Service First Seen" | eval Information=coalesce('http.server', 'tls.cn', 'ssh.server.software_version', "No detail") | table ip port app_proto Information "Service First Seen" Network "Host First Seen"

table.title: Display hosts with a spike in alerts for signatures that have not been seen before on the host.

search.query: event_type="alert" sourcetype="suricata:alert" | spath alert | eval ip=mvappend(src_ip, dest_ip) | lookup ip_alert_seen.csv ip, alert.signature_id | eval alert_first_seen=if(isnull(first_seen), relative_time(now(), "+1d@d"), strptime(first_seen, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6N%z")) | addinfo | eval diff_alert_start=(tonumber(alert_first_seen) - info_min_time) | search diff_alert_start > 0 | stats distinct_count(alert.signature_id) as uniq_alerts, min(timestamp) as alerts_first_seen, max(timestamp) as alerts_last_seen by ip | search uniq_alerts >= 4 | eval alert_start= strptime(alerts_first_seen, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6N%z") | eval alert_end= strptime(alerts_last_seen, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6N%z") | eval duration=tostring(round(alert_end - alert_start, 0), "duration") | table ip, uniq_alerts, alerts_first_seen, alerts_last_seen, duration

table.title: New HTTP user agents that are only seen on a rare population of hosts in the internal network

search.query: | snhostsearch filter="http_user_agent=*" | spath | rename first_seen as host_first_seen | spath net_info{0}.agg output=network | spath path=http_user_agent{} output=agent_data | mvexpand agent_data | spath input=agent_data | eval time_seen=strptime(first_seen,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6N%z") | eventstats count(ip) as agent_count, min(time_seen) as agent_first_seen by agent | eventstats min(agent_count) AS minHits max(agent_count) AS maxHits | eval agentPrime=(agent_count-minHits)/(maxHits-minHits) | sort agentPrime, agent | addinfo | where agent_first_seen > info_min_time AND agentPrime <= 0.2 | table agent, ip, network, first_seen, host_first_seen, agentPrime

table.title: New TLS user agents that are only seen on a rare population of hosts in the internal network

search.query: | snhostsearch filter="tls_ja3=*" | spath | rename first_seen as host_first_seen | spath net_info{0}.agg output=network | spath path=tls_ja3{} output=agent_data | mvexpand agent_data | spath input=agent_data | spath input=agent_data path=agent{0} output=agent | eval time_seen=strptime(first_seen,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6N%z") | eventstats count(ip) as agent_count, min(time_seen) as agent_first_seen by hash | eventstats min(agent_count) AS minHits max(agent_count) AS maxHits | eval agentPrime=(agent_count-minHits)/(maxHits-minHits) | sort agentPrime, hash | addinfo | where agent_first_seen > info_min_time AND agentPrime <= 0.2 | table hash, agent, ip, network, first_seen, host_first_seen, agentPrime

table.title: New SSH user agents that are only seen on a rare population of hosts in the internal network

search.query: | snhostsearch filter="ssh_client=*" | spath | rename first_seen as host_first_seen | spath net_info{0}.agg output=network | spath path=ssh_client{} output=agent_data | mvexpand agent_data | spath input=agent_data | eval time_seen=strptime(first_seen,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6N%z") | eventstats count(ip) as agent_count, min(time_seen) as agent_first_seen by software_version | eventstats min(agent_count) AS minHits max(agent_count) AS maxHits | eval agentPrime=(agent_count-minHits)/(maxHits-minHits) | sort agentPrime, hash | addinfo | where agent_first_seen > info_min_time AND agentPrime <= 0.2 | table software_version, ip, network, first_seen, host_first_seen, agentPrime
